Name: MPI_STATUSES_IGNORE
Description: MPI_STATUSES_IGNORE informs MPI to not fill the array of MPI_Status, which saves some time. It is used in multi-request waiting (MPI_Waitall and MPI_Waitsome) and testing (MPI_Testall and MPI_Testsome). A version of MPI_STATUSES_IGNORE exists also for a single status: MPI_STATUS_IGNORE.
